articles.content:
Greetings to Angolan foreign minister 
    Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Angolan counterpart Joao Bernardo De Miranda on the occasion of the 26th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
 In the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to be boosted in the future, the message sincerely wished the foreign minister and people of Angola greater success in their work to put an end to the civil war as early as possible and rehabilitate the ruined economy.

articles.title: More meetings held
articles.content:
Greetings to Central African President 
    Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on November 28 sent a message of greetings to Ange-Felix Patasse, head of state and President of Central Africa, on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of the proclamation of the Central African Republic.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the president, government and people of Central Africa on the occasion and expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop.    
 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Central Africa greater success in their work for the stability of the country and social development.
